# homeUniqueIdentifier

**Instance Property**

The home that accessories were added to.

## Declaration

```swift
var homeUniqueIdentifier: UUID { get }
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMHome/uniqueIdentifier] for more information.

## Getting results

- **accessoryUniqueIdentifiers**: The values corresponding to accessories that are set up.
